feedback-error-generic: Whoops, that didn't work. Please try again.
feedback-scan-unsuccessful: We weren't able to recognise your document. Please try again.
initialization-error: Failed to load component. Please try using another device or update your browser.
drop-error: Whoops, we don't support that image format. Please upload a JPEG or PNG file.
camera-in-use: Camera already used by another application.
camera-feedback-scan-back: Scan the other side of the card
help-doc-invalid-to-much-motion-descript: Keep the phone and card still while scanning. Moving either may blur the image and make the card details unreadable.
help-doc-invalid-harsh-light-description: Avoid direct, harsh light as it can reflect off the card and make parts of it unreadable. If you can’t read the data on the card yourself, the camera won’t be able to either.
help-doc-invalid-invisible-fields-descri: Make sure you’re not covering any part of the card with your fingers, including the bottom lines. Also watch out for hologram reflections that may obscure the card’s fields.
help-doc-valid-card-number-field-descrip: The card number is usually 16 digits long, though it may be between 12 and 19 digits. It will be printed or embossed in raised numbers on the card, either on the front or the back.
help-doc-valid-description: The card number is usually 16 digits long. It will be printed or embossed in raised numbers on the card. Make sure the card is well lit and that all details are clearly visible.
